content_descriptors.notes: Weed's World is a local multiplayer game that includes mature themes related to drug use, specifically cannabis. Players control characters who collect pot leaves and use bongs as power-ups. The game is designed with a humorous approach to cannabis culture and contains 420-themed jokes and references that may not be suitable for all ages.

name: Weedy's World

  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600 | AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: Invidia GTX 950 | AMD RS Vega 10

short_description: Weedy's World is a one or two-player game set in a U.P. Michigan dispensary called Glazed & Confused, players navigate a cannabis maze as Weedy or Ms. Weedy, collecting pot leaves and using power-ups while avoiding aliens. Inspired by Pac-Man, the game adds a unique twist with 420-themed humor.
